CustomField.description: Open this event in the OneForm CMS to view its sponsor materials forms.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OneForm_ID__c > 1, RecordTypeId ="01230000000ueuw" ), HYPERLINK("https://cms.erepublic.com/common/events/sponsor_assets/"&TEXT(OneForm_ID__c),"Open in CMS"), "Not Synced" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Open this event in the OneForm CMS to view its sponsor materials forms.
CustomField.label: OneForm Sponsor Materials
